# Jealous Fork - Miami's Original Artisan Pancake Restaurant
# https://jealousfork.com

> Jealous Fork is an artisan pancake and gourmet burger restaurant in Miami, Florida.
> Founded by best friends Joaquin Ortiz and Henrik Telle, it evolved from the first artisan pancake food truck in the country.
> Located at 14417 SW 42nd St, Miami, FL 33175. Phone: (305) 699-1430

## About
Jealous Fork started as the first artisan pancake food truck in the country. After tremendous success with lines stretching around the block, founders Joaquin Ortiz and Henrik Telle opened a full restaurant. Known for Instagram-worthy pancakes and featured on Telemundo National. The restaurant has a 4.7 star Google rating with over 400 reviews.

## Location
14417 SW 42nd St
Miami, FL 33175
United States

## Hours of Operation
- Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Thursday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Friday: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM (Pancakes all day, Burgers 3PM-9PM)
- Saturday: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM (Pancakes all day, Burgers 3PM-9PM)
- Sunday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Monday: Closed

Note: Jealous Burger operates Friday-Saturday 3PM-9PM alongside our pancake menu. You can order both pancakes AND burgers during burger hours!

## Contact
- Phone: (305) 699-1430
- Website: https://jealousfork.com
- Reservations: Available through Resy

## Menu Highlights

### Signature Pancakes
- Hot Maple Flatbread ($16) - Cup and char pepperoni, double cream mozzarella, and red chili-black pepper maple
- Chocolate Oreo Chip Pancake ($17) - Crushed Oreos, chocolate chips, Oreo whipped cream, chocolate ganache
- Peanut Butter Cup Pancake ($17) - Reese's cups, nutter butter whipped cream, peanut butter maple syrup
- Lemon Curd and Blueberry Pancake ($15) - Light pancakes topped with fresh blueberries and tangy lemon curd
- Banana Walnut Pancake ($17) - Caramelized bananas, toasted walnuts, house-smoked maple syrup

### Gourmet Burgers (Jealous Burger - Friday & Saturday 3PM-9PM)
Miami's best gourmet burgers with classic patties (not smash burgers) and creative toppings. We brought the same creativity from our award-winning pancakes to craft 9 unique burgers. Pancakes still available during burger hours!

- The Classic ($13) - Cheddar Cheese, That Secret Sauce, Tomato, Onion, Spring Greens
- Jesse James ($16) - Applewood Smoked Bacon, Crispy Onions, BBQ Sauce, Cheddar Cheese
- La La Land ($16) - Guac, Tomato, Cilantro, Sunflower Seeds, Dried Cranberries, White Cheddar, Spring Greens
- The Devil's Advocate ($17) - Smokehouse Chili, Cheddar Cheese, Hot Hot Shake First, Fried Egg
- LÃ© French ($17) - Brie Cheese, Caramelized Onions, Framboise, Spring Greens
- The OG JB ($17) - Pickled Onions, Smoked Gouda, Tomato-Poblano Jam
- Billie Holiday ($16) - Maytag Blue Cheese, Caramelized Onions, Spring Greens
- Que Bola Meng ($16) - Guava & Queso, Caramelized Onions, Papitas (Miami-inspired!)
- VEGburger ($16) - Black Bean-Chipotle Patty, Aged White Cheddar, Tomato, Onion, Spring Greens
